Review Name: Wonderful Review Description: Firstly,thanks to flipkart for faster delivery.Installation was done very next day after receiving product.Fully satisfied with cooling. Pros: 1.High cooling is the best feature in this ac as it cools room quickly.(HC button is shown in the wireless remote). 2.Latest technology used. 3.As it claims"Quieter than a whisper".Sound is really quieter. 4.No stabalizer needed,power consumption is less comparing to other ac(5 star) 5.Swing function is of two types:vertical and horizontal....it covers entire room and cools within 2 minutes. Cons: Nothing Lg's dual inverter AC is the best to buy in a budget of 50K.So without any worries you can trust this AC.Every feature is awesome. Ratings: Cooling-5/5 Value for money-5/5 Installation-5/5.
